2024-07-17.q3: I’m steered by your hands and propelled by your feet or electricity.
2024-07-17.q4: Kick me and motor me are common varieties.
2024-07-17.q5: I’m similar to a bike or motorcycle, though you usually stand on me.

2024-07-19.q3: I’m in the land down under.
2024-07-19.q4: People here talk about arvos, brekkies, and mates.
2024-07-19.q5: This place is known for its biodiversity, including animals like koalas and kangaroos.

2024-07-20.q4: You make cement, paper, bricks, and pottery with me.
2024-07-20.q5: I’m a grey-brown soil that’s part of shale, loam, and mud.

2024-07-22.q4: I can get a combo meal here.
2024-07-22.q5: I can order a Happy Meal here.

2024-07-23.q2: I was invented in the Swiss Alps.
2024-07-23.q3: I’m made up of a lot of pieces (the more the younger you are).
2024-07-23.q4: You’ll often see me during a spooky, scary holiday.
2024-07-23.q5: I’m a Winter Olympic sport or an organ system in many animals.
